name: Toadna: The Adventure Begins
description:
Toadna is a fangame where you play as a twili fungus who has to stop the evil from happening.

Gameplay is a mix of a 2D Zelda game with the look, feel, and style of a Mario RPG, while utilizing and combining many elements from both series.

The game is currently in a demo state,  right now it contains the prologue and first chapter (and also like 1 sidequest).

There' s also a discord server, however it is still a wip, a link will be provided when it's done.
